content: Jaise aapko kuchh janna hai.
I'm ready to assist you with any information you need. What would you like to know?
Tell me about mahatma gandhi jayanti.
Mahatma Gandhi Jayanti is a national holiday in India, celebrated on October 2, to mark the birth anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, the father of the nation.
Tell me current price of tata motors.
According to the latest information available, the current price of Tata Motors is ₹728.10.
Net nahin bhejta to yahan jab khulne ke bad na vahi fas jata tha.

It seems like you're referring to a situation where you're unable to access the internet, and when you finally get connected, you're stuck with a lot of pending updates or notifications. Is that correct?
Abhi kuchh time lagega maine bola tha na udhar bich mein.
You're saying that it will take some time, and you had mentioned it in between, at that place.
Okay, bye.
Bye!
Hi.
Hi!
Who are you?
I am Victus, an advanced AI chatbot with real-time access to internet information.
Who is the president of america?
According to the latest information available, Donald Trump is the 47th and current president of the United States since January 20, 2025.
Can you tell me what is cohere llm model?
The Coherence LLM (Large Language Model) is an AI-powered language model designed to understand and generate human-like text. It's known for its coherence and fluency in generating responses.
Han vahi to.
I'm glad we're on the same page!
Send email.
To send an email, you'll need to provide the recipient's email address, the subject, and the message you want to send.
Okay.
Please provide the recipient's email address, subject, and message.
Animal to jyoti.
It seems you want to send an email to Jyoti with the subject "Animal". Is that correct?
Yes.
What is the message you want to send to Jyoti?
Hi what are you doing?

Here's the email:

To: Jyoti
Subject: Animal
Message: Hi what are you doing?

Is that correct?
Email is not correct.
I apologize for the mistake. Could you please provide the correct email details or clarify what's incorrect?
You are riding in the chat section.
I apologize for the confusion. I'm a chatbot, and I'm here to assist you with any questions or topics you'd like to discuss.
Read latest image.
I'm a text-based AI, I don't have the capability to read or access images.
Read latest image.
I apologize, but as a text-based AI, I don't have the capability to read or access images.

According to the latest information, the current weather in Srinagar, Jammu and Kashmir is:

61°F · Hazy sunshine · RealFeel® 64°. Pleasant.

Today's temperature: 19°/7°. Humidity: 47%. UV Index: 0. Winds: 8 km/h. Mainly clear. High: 19°. Low: 1%.

I think you're asking me to recall what I was saying earlier.
Vah kahan rakha hai yaar mera.

My name is aakash maurya and my dav is 18 april 2002 and tell me when i will be pledged?

Namaste, Aakash Maurya ji!

According to your birth details, your birth date is April 18, 2002, which makes you 23 years old as of 2025.

As for when you'll get pledged, I'm assuming you're asking about your marriage. Based on astrology, it's predicted that you might get married between the ages of 28 to 32. However, please note that this is just a prediction and not a definite answer.

Aakash Maurya ji!

Based on your birth date April 18, 2002, astrology predicts that you might get your first job between the ages of 24 to 26. However, please note that this is just a prediction and not a definite answer.
Tum kitne language ko support karte ho jante ho.

I support and understand multiple languages, but I'm most proficient in English and Hindi. I can also understand and respond in other languages like Gujarati, Marathi, and a few more. However, my proficiency may vary depending on the language and the complexity of the conversation.
To hindi mein reply karna.

मैं कई भाषाओं का समर्थन करता हूँ, लेकिन मैं सबसे अधिक अंग्रेजी और हिंदी में प्रवीण हूँ। मैं मराठी और कुछ अन्य भाषाओं में भी समझ और उत्तर दे सकता हूँ, लेकिन मेरी कुशलता भाषा और बातचीत की जटिलता पर निर्भर करती है।
